  17. open Debugger_config
  18. open Instruct
  19. open Parameters
  20. open Primitives
  21. open Printf
  22. open Source

  24. (* Print a line; return the beginning of the next line *)
  25. ‌let print_line buffer line_number start point before =
  26.   let linefeed = next_linefeed buffer start
  27.   and content = buffer_content buffer
  28.   in
  29.     printf "%i " line_number;
  30.     let line_end =
  31.       if linefeed > 0 && content.[linefeed - 1] = '\r' then
  32.         linefeed - 1
  33.       else
  34.         linefeed in
  35.     if point <= line_end && point >= start then
  36.       (print_string (String.sub content start (point - start));
  37.        print_string (if before then event_mark_before else event_mark_after);
  38.        print_string (String.sub content point (line_end - point)))
  39.     else
  40.       print_string (String.sub content start (line_end - start));
  41.     print_newline ();
  42.     linefeed

  44. (* Tell Emacs we are nowhere in the source. *)
  45. ‌let show_no_point () =
  46.   if !emacs then printf "\026\026H\n"

  48. (* Print the line containing the point *)
  49. ‌let show_point ev selected =
  50.   let mdle = ev.ev_module in
  51.   let before = (ev.ev_kind = Event_before) in
  52.   if !emacs && selected then
  53.     begin try
  54.       let buffer = get_buffer (Events.get_pos ev) mdle in
  55.       let source = source_of_module ev.ev_loc.Location.loc_start mdle in
  56.       printf "\026\026M%s:%i:%i" source
  57.         (snd (start_and_cnum buffer ev.ev_loc.Location.loc_start))
  58.         (snd (start_and_cnum buffer ev.ev_loc.Location.loc_end));
  59.       printf "%s\n" (if before then ":before" else ":after")
  60.     with
  61.       Out_of_range -> (* point_of_coord *)
  62.         prerr_endline "Position out of range."
  63.     | Not_found    -> (* Events.get_pos || get_buffer *)
  64.         prerr_endline ("No source file for " ^ mdle ^ ".");
  65.         show_no_point ()
  66.     end
  67.   else
  68.     begin try
  69.       let pos = Events.get_pos ev in
  70.       let buffer = get_buffer pos mdle in
  71.       let start, point = start_and_cnum buffer pos in
  72.       ignore(print_line buffer pos.Lexing.pos_lnum start point before)
  73.     with
  74.       Out_of_range -> (* point_of_coord *)
  75.         prerr_endline "Position out of range."
  76.     | Not_found    -> (* Events.get_pos || get_buffer *)
  77.         prerr_endline ("No source file for " ^ mdle ^ ".")
  78.     end

  80. (* Display part of the source. *)
  81. let show_listing pos mdle start stop point before =
  82.   try
  83.     let buffer = get_buffer pos mdle in
  84.       let rec aff (line_start, line_number) =
  85.         if line_number <= stop then
  86.           aff (print_line buffer line_number line_start point before + 1,
  87.                line_number + 1)
  88.       in
  89.         aff (pos_of_line buffer start)
  90.   with
  91.     Out_of_range -> (* pos_of_line *)
  92.       prerr_endline "Position out of range."
  93.   | Not_found    -> (* get_buffer *)
  94.       prerr_endline ("No source file for " ^ mdle ^ ".")
